inclusion.criterion: Frail geriatric patient according to the Cardiovascular Health Study (CHS) Frailty
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Life expectancy less than 6 months for any clinical reason
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Hospital Admission in the last 3 months for any clinical reason
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Oncologic patients in chemotherapy or radiotherapy active treatment
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Major surgery in the last 6 months
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: First-degree centenary relatives in the two previous generations
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Ischemic coronary event in the last 12 months
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Impossibility of displacement to the Health Center by themselves
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: 17 year old boy with vomiting, non-bloody diarrhea, abdominal pain, fever, chills and loss of appetite for the past 3 days. Shiga-like toxin-producing E. coli (STEC) stx1/stx2 were found in stools.
